name: honey-gather

effect.black_white: This Pokémon has a chance of picking up honey after each battle. This chance starts at 5% and rises another 5% after every tenth level: 5% from level 1–10, 10% from 11–20, and so on, up to 50% from 91–100. This ability is checked after the battle ends, at which point any temporary ability changes have worn off.
effect.black_2_white_2: This Pokémon has a chance of picking up honey after each battle. This chance starts at 5% and rises another 5% after every tenth level: 5% from level 1–10, 10% from 11–20, and so on, up to 50% from 91–100. This ability is checked after the battle ends, at which point any temporary ability changes have worn off.

short_effect: The Pokémon may pick up honey after battle.

flavor_text.black_white: The Pokémon may gather Honey from somewhere.
flavor_text.black_2_white_2: The Pokémon may gather Honey from somewhere.
